Detailed Description

Renderer base class. Used as an interface for core callback.

virtual XFCIMPORT void XFcRenderer::render (    )  [virtual]
 

Called every time in the rendering loop.

virtual XFCIMPORT INT XFcRenderer::updateScreen (  void *    aMoreInfo )  [virtual]
 

Called before back buffer is displayed on screen.

The function should return 1 if it has handled the screen update, or for some other reason doesn't want the core to update the screen, or 0 to let core carry on. aMoreInfo parameter points to platform- specific information, and is currently reserved.
